extensionDescription.message: Automatically close old tabs after a configurable time period to keep your browser fast and organized.

browserActionTitle.description: Title shown when hovering over the browser action button.

discardPinnedLabel.description: Label for discard pinned tabs setting.

discardPinnedTooltip.message: Discarding unloads tab content from memory but keeps the tab visible. Tabs reload when clicked.
discardPinnedTooltip.description: Tooltip explaining what discarding tabs means.

excludeAudioLabel.description: Label for exclude audio tabs setting.

closeTabsButton.description: Text for the button that closes old tabs.

closingTabsProgress.description: Text shown while tabs are being closed.

footerText.message: FFTabClose v2.0 - Manage your tabs automatically

noDomainRulesText.description: Text shown when no domain rules are configured.

permContextualIdentitiesDescription.message: To support Firefox containers and workspaces

infoDescription.message: FFTabClose helps you keep your browser organized by automatically closing tabs you haven't used in a while, across all browser windows and workspaces.

infoLinkText.description: Text for the link to the informational page.

timeTest.description: 1 minute time limit option for testing.

infoTimerDescription.message: Each tab has its own timer that starts when it's opened or activated. Tabs are closed or discarded automatically once they exceed your specified time limit. Your settings persist even when restarting the browser.
infoTimerDescription.description: Description of how the timer system works.

infoExclusionsDescription.message: Tabs that are playing audio are never closed or discarded. Pinned tabs are not closed but can be unloaded to save memory. Currently active tabs in any window are never closed.
infoExclusionsDescription.description: Description of which tabs are protected from closing.

permTabsDescription.message: To monitor and manage tabs across all windows

permStorageDescription.message: To save your preferences and tab timers

infoDiscardDescription.message: Discarding unloads tab content from memory but keeps the tab visible. Tabs reload automatically when you click on them.
infoDiscardDescription.description: Description of how tab discarding works.
